name: Five Nights with Freddy
description:
Five Nights with Freddy [RELEASED]

_______________________________________________________________________

PLOT

You have been hired to become a house nightguard at Afton's house. Freddy has managed to locate you and find you. He's now in the house and you watch for the house. Can you survive Five Nights with Freddy? _______________________________________________________________________
Music: Steve Syz Engine: FNaF Engine & FNaF Maker

Voices: Davu - Phone Guy Design: FNaFDev and NotFlamingo (notflamingo.itch.io)

Jumpscare Animation: Scott Cawthon (no, he didn't co-make this, we BORROWED the jumpscare)

Coding: FNaFDev and NotFlamingo

Contributers: NotFlamingo _______________________________________________________________________
